remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合中的项数已等于集合的容量，则会在插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，从而使容量加倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果 `index` 参数等于 ，则将 `message` 参数添加到的末尾 。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `message` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素向下移动以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DescriptionNamespaceSample1/CPP/descriptionnamespacesample1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DescriptionNamespaceSample1/CS/descriptionnamespacesample1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DescriptionNamespaceSample1/VB/descriptionnamespacesample1.vb#8)]
